alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Northern Valley; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:41AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Daniels, Roosevelt, northeastern Valley, Sheridan and northeastern McCone Counties through 345 AM MDT... At 241 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Peerless to 8 miles west of Lustre. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Opheim, Richland, Nashua, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, St. Marie, Peerless, Port Of Whitetail, Lustre, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey and Redstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
